E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the method of the operation is that the patient lies on his back, and then with your left hand you extend the head of the penis forcefully, and cut off the head of the penis at the location of the foreskin with a sharp scalpel, as one would cut a feather or shave some part, so that the middle part of it resembles the head of the penis and that the wound falls in its proper place as needed.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And be careful during your operation to stop bleeding, as this often happens; and pause the procedure until you have stopped the bleeding, and treat the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter LVI.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Of the inflammation that occurs in the foreskin at the head of the penis, and of corruption, blackening, and adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	This inflammation often occurs in the penis and is a soft tissue prominence.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one of these is malignant and the other is non-malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	For benign cases, suspend one ounce of the subtle substance and cut off that which holds the entire mole; then place upon it a poultice made with Egyptian myrrh; and afterwards treat it with a cleansing agent until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	And if the mole is malignant and of a dark color, then you should administer cauterization at the base of it and around its ratio (proportion).
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	But if the mole is on the foreskin of an uncircumcised penis, and one part of the mole is inside the foreskin while the other part is outside, then you should remove the part that is inside as soon as it begins to heal; and afterwards treat the part that is outside, because when treating both at once with the foreskin, there is no assurance that it will not be injured.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And if similar conditions occur in the genitalia and on the foreskin, such as blackening and corruption, then you should excise everything that is already discolored and what is about to become corrupted or what is already corrupt; and afterwards apply a dressing over it with honey, which has been crushed with ground wheat bran and finely sifted.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And afterwards treat it with other methods until it is healed.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	But if there is bleeding, then administer lunar cauterization according to this method:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	because cauterization is beneficial in two situations together: for bleeding and when the wound becomes corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corroded and completely destroyed, then you should insert a lead tube into the urethra so that the urine can pass through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis (and this adherence does not occur except in one whose foreskin is his, and upon whom circumcision is not required; and when adherence occurs due to a plague or an abscess) it should be that you scrape with a blunt spatula so that the bond may dissolve and the head of the penis may be released entirely.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to distinguish them carefully, then you should scrape with a spatula some part of the head of the penis and the foreskin, and this is because when the foreskin is fine, due to its fineness it can be easily perforated by its subtlety.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And then separate between the foreskin and the head of the penis with a fine thread, which is moistened in water, so that they do not adhere again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then treat with styptic juice so that it may be healed and consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter LVII.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	On the cleansing of children and the treatment of what occurs during circumcision.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not a solution like the continuity of other plagues; however, since it is part of our practice and our will, and since it properly applies to children, it is necessary that we assign the best procedure and the easiest path leading to health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Therefore, I say that the ancients did not mention circumcision in any of their books because they do not use it in their laws, and this is only because we have acquired it through experience. The reason I have found is that most surgeons and barbers use a razor and scissors for circumcision and cleansing; and they use thread made of sinew and incision with the fingernail.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	Thus have I described all these methods and found no better modification with scissors, thread, or nail in the modification as with the nail, since most times you avoid the cicatrix above, because the cicatrix of the foreskin has two tunics, and remove the tunic below, and it is necessary for another incision and certain pain.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And in the modification which is done by alphabetic means, and is digital, which surgeons use, the incision of the extremity of the male member is not secured, since it easily enters into the groove.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	But in the operation with a nail, you may easily err and corrupt your operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the cicatrix of a child is short by nature, and most often they are born in such a way that there is no need for modification, and I have seen that.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	But concerning the modification that is done with scissors and thread with a needle, the goodness and experience reveals to me, since the scissors are of proportional incision, by which the sharpness above is as the sharpness below; and thus when you press your hand proportionally on both sharpnesses, and make an incision according to a comparison at once; and it is made compression of the needle in the figure containing the cicatrix of the penis all around, with which you catch no error at all.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the method of the first operation is that you make the child lie down if it is one of those whom I consider a small one, and that you bind the needle to his penis only, and leave that for another day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then make him cheerful in every way that is possible to you from what he can understand.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	Let him stand between your legs preparedly, and let it not be seen by anyone else; and hide the scissors in your hand or leave them tied up, so that the child does not see them or any other of the instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Then insert your hand into the penis and blow into the urethra, and pull it in so that the head of the penis is retracted, and then clean what is attached there from filth.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Then mark the place with fire twice, and then ligature the lower part of that with a small second ligature, and then tie the place of the ligature well below with good retention, and incise between the two ligatures.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then raise the urethra gently and extract the head of the penis; then let the blood flow slowly, for it is better; and sprinkle powder over it, and on top of the powder place a cloth dipped in vinegar from a hen that has been kept with rose oil recently prepared well; and leave it like that until the other day; and treat it with care until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the scissors used for cleaning is as follows:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	Let one set of blades be unsharpened and the other sharpened, so that the tip of the blade does not come out, and let the length of both sharp edges be equal to the length of two fingers equally.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	The mistake in cleaning is that you may forcefully evade the intrinsic urethra entirely or part of it during the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore, you should extend that from your hour to your nail in front of the abscessed area and incise it according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your finger, now extract it with a lancet and incise it.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	And if three days have passed and the swelling remains below the testicle as an abscess, now you should lay open what is inside until the abscess discharges, and clean that which has been laid open, and incise that according to your preparation.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And be careful of the head of the testicle, for it should not suffer from this.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	And thus cure that which is open with the plasters made from the powders we have recommended in the treatise on powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it is incised too much from the cord, and you follow the instructions above, this will not harm it.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	And then cure that which is open as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter LVIII.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	On the treatment of retained urine in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by obstruction due to a stone or blood clots, or pus or flesh, and similar conditions as those we have mentioned regarding the methods of treatment in the division.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine does not dissolve, and retention occurs because of a stone that is in the neck of the bladder, now it is necessary for the patient to bend over onto their knees.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	And then place the feet of that person on their knees and extend their belly from the part above their buttocks, and have the patient strain their breath as much as is possible.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Therefore, when the neck of the bladder is constricted for the expulsion of the stone to the rear parts, urine is passed.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if it is not dissolved by the water that we have mentioned and the forceful cause of the ailment is established, then it is necessary to administer extraction with an instrument called a siringua, which has the following form: It should be made of silver and be as thin as a reed quill, like a canula from a bird's feather with fineness and length similar to half a palm, at its end there should be a thin tube.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the method of testing the urine with it is that you take a thread and tie one end to the extremity of the wool or cloth for a good binding; and insert the ends of the thread into the lower part of the siringua, and cut off any excess wool with scissors if necessary. Then insert it into the tube with force and withdraw the siringua gently.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	And treat the ailment above the pubic region, and inject the bladder with a tube anointed with oil, olive oil, and aqua regia.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	And then insert the siringua with ease until it reaches the end of the tube; and then bend the tube above the part where it will be inserted; and then push the siringua inside that; and then push that into the bladder until the ailment is reached, and if this is not done in this order, but rather in the one that goes to a tortuous path.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then pull the thread with the cloth little by little, for the urine will wet the cloth.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Here is the English translation:
Capitol .lix.	Chapter LIX.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the quality of enemas for the bladder, with the use of an enema bag and similar instruments, which are appropriate for this purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When ulcers or abscesses occur in the bladder, or when there is clotted blood or obstructed pus, and you wish to administer water and medicines into it, then an instrument called clampcedra should be used, and this is its form:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	but at the tip of it, it is blunt, so that it may be closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in that part there are three parts: two on one side, as you can see.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	At the beginning, it is concave, where what is to be introduced is placed, and it should be according to the quantity that needs to be expelled, without addition, until when any cause draws out the moisture, it can be drawn out, and when it is expelled, with this as well, and when it is expelled far, as the clampcedra does which has naphtha attached for naval battles.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore, when you want to extract moisture from the bladder, insert the tip of the clampcedra into the moisture, and draw out with it the water that is introduced into the side parts, for the moisture is drawn into the concavity of the clampcedra.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	And then insert the tip of the clampcedra into the tube as we have recommended in the circular part; and then introduce the moisture with what you are introducing, for that moisture will reach the bladder immediately, along with the treatment.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The form of the instrument with which the bladder is treated is subtle, and this is its form:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And it should be made of silver or of lead, with its head being similar to a small feather, and below the thread is drawn.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	And then take a bladder of an animal, and place in it the humidity that you want to crystallize in the bladder, and then tie it up between two strong ligatures made of fine thread, and heat that humidity over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	And then insert the end of the crystal into the arm.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	And then press your hand on the bladder with the humidity until it is well distributed inside so that the patient feels that the humidity has reached the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if a bladder is not available to you, then take a piece of parchment and make it into a circle; and perforate it all around its circumference; and then insert strong thread into those holes, both ways; and then attach the circle as it should be attached, so that you place in it what you want from humidities, oils, and waters.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then tie it to the instrument and do with it as you did with the bladder, and press your hand so that the humidity reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the Extraction of Stones.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already mentioned in the division the kinds of stones and their treatment with medicines, and the difference between stones generated in the kidneys and those generated in the bladder, as well as the signs of each.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have described the stone in which the operation is performed and its section.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the stone generated in the bladder properly is that which is lodged in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And he who wishes to narrate it will do so with that clear exposition and abbreviation.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Therefore, I say that the stone generated in the bladder mainly affects children; and of its signs is that the urine which is expelled from the bladder resembles water in its subtlety, but there appears a kind of sand; and the patient scratches his genitals, and has frequent urges to urinate, and soon becomes erect; and with these words you will find the cause.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is easy to cure the children before they reach fourteen years of age; and it is a difficult treatment for older individuals.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in young people it is moderate compared to those extremes.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And for the one in whom the stone is larger, the cure is longer; and if it is small, the opposite is true.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore, to reach the cure for that condition, we begin by cleansing the patient with a diet that excludes all foods which prevent the dissolution of the stone due to their nature.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And then let the patient lie on his back and be placed in a position that causes the stone to descend to the neck of the bladder, or move from its place, by various means.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then make the patient lie between his thighs, well prepared, and place him with his legs apart, so that the bladder is made to slope towards the sides.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And thus he probes that and all around it.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	So if you feel the stone in the space, now you should cut it immediately with a section of it.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if you do not catch it right away with your touch, now it is necessary for you to anoint with oil your index finger of the left hand, if female, or the middle finger if male, and insert that into their anus.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And probe for the stone until it is within reach of your finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And gently guide it little by little into the bladder neck.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And then press on that with your finger, and expel it outwards towards the place where the section was made.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And command the assistant to press the bladder with his hand; and command another assistant to spread the thighs outward with one hand, and with the other hand pull back the skin that is in front of the thighs, at the place where the section is made.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert a probe that has this shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	and cut in there what is between the anus and the thighs, not in the middle, but towards the left side; and make the incision over that stone with your finger in the anus, and make a transverse section so that the external part of the incision is wide and the internal part narrow according to how much you can extract from the stone, but no more, because it is easier for your finger to compress the stone outside the incision without difficulty.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that some stones have angles and edges, because of which it is difficult to polish them smoothly.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And this one resembles a lion's paw in shape, it is round, and it is made of a stone that can be polished easily.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Then adjust it in the fissure where there are angles and edges.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not inserted properly, now cover it over that area, or attach something over it decently, the end of which should be like a file with which you stroke over the stone, and do not move away from it; or insert an intricate curved instrument beneath it.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot do that, then slightly enlarge the wound, and if you see blood flowing, cauterize it with a vinegar solution of nitre.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if there is more than one stone, at the beginning you press your hand to the bladder's mouth, and then cut around it; and then slightly move it away from there; and similarly proceed if they are in groups of more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, it is unwise to cut it into large pieces, because this may cause one of two harmful outcomes: either death or that it leads to continuous urine leakage, since the area might not heal completely.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	But administer an expulsion to remove it entirely, or devise a fracture of it with forceps to extract it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Then when you have completed your operation, now fill the wound with pieces of aloes and dragon's blood, and cauterize it.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And pause over that cloth infused in oil and wine, or in rose oil and water mixture, so that the abscess may yield.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And apply the poultice to the affected area on the side of the neck, and do not loosen the bandage within the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when that area is unbandaged, wash the place with water and a little oil, and apply care to it with chamomile ointment and with balm ointment until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	But if in the wound an abscess should occur that is hard and corrosive, and of such appearance as if the blood is frozen in a bladder, and because of this urination is prevented (and this is known by the mixture of blood with urine), then insert your finger into the wound and extract that blood, for if it remains it will cause corruption of the bladder and putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with sour wine, water and salt, and apply whatever is appropriate to it for healing until it is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And it is necessary throughout the entire treatment that you change both the dressings and adjust the medicines which are applied to the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and is in the urethra, and is stuck there, and urination is prevented, then treat it with what I recommend before resorting to section, because many have been accused of unnecessarily proceeding to section due to this treatment; and indeed, I suggest this, which is that you take a blunt iron probe, which has the following shape:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	with a triangular tip, sharp, attached to a handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	Take some wax, and tie it to the thread below the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	Approach and insert the needle into the thread, piercing with ease until it reaches the stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And rotate the needle with your hand on that small stone little by little, and you will pierce it through so that one end can penetrate as the other enters; for the urine will immediately be released.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand on what is broken from the stone that has come out beyond the thread, for this part is cracked and will pass with the urine, and thus the illness will be cured.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this treatment is not suitable for you due to some reason that prevents it, then tie a piece of wax below the stone and another piece above the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then cut into the stone on that thread between the two ties.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then untie the ligature and clean the collected blood, which has formed around the stone.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And it is not necessary to tie wax below the stone except to prevent it from returning to the bladder, and the other ligature above it, because when the wax near the swelling of the stone is untied, the cord will return to its place and reform the swelling.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason, when you tie the wax above, you need to lift the cord to the upper parts, or return it to its proper position, so that the swelling reforms as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter LXI.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the Extraction of Stones from Women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Stones in women are rarely formed.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	If a stone is found in any of them, the treatment is difficult at that time and is prohibited by many methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of these is that the woman must be strong and light.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you often do not find a woman who will honestly reveal whether she has had sexual intercourse when chaste, or whether she is one of those women who have husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you often do not find a woman who knows this art, especially the operation without a man.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the location for the incision to reach a stone in women is far from the location of the stone, which requires a deeper incision, and there is danger in this.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if necessity compels you to do this, then it is necessary for you to take a skilled female assistant, and such are rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you lack such an assistant, then seek a wise and subtle woman, or present a midwife who is experienced with women, or a woman well-versed in this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Therefore, present such a person and command her to do everything you instruct her from the examination of the stone at the beginning; the reason for this is to check if the woman is chaste, so she should insert her finger into the woman's body to locate the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Thus if you find it there, cut it below the joint, and then instruct him to incise upon that.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if it is not soft, then instruct the midwife to insert the joint into the woman's vagina and feel for the stone, as she places her left hand on the bladder, and compress that with good pressure.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Thus if you find it there, then proceed to gradually extract that from the opening of the bladder towards the parts below as far as its full extent until it reaches the root of the matter.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	And then incise upon that spot in the middle of the vagina at the root of the matter from whichever part it is to him and center the stone in that part, and ensure that the said member is not dislodged from the stone by cutting below it.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And let the incision be small at first; then insert the probe into that incision, and if you feel the stone, then adjust the incision according to the amount by which you know the stone will be expelled from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that the types of stones are various: some are small and hard, others are sharp and rough, long and round, and having ridges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore, you should know the types of stones as you signify according to what you wish to describe.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you wish to have blood flow, apply triturated vitriol to that area for one hour until the blood is drawn, and then return to your operation until the stone is expelled.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	Take note that you should prepare for yourself the instruments which are mentioned in the extraction of stones from men, so that you may be aided by them in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see blood flowing and you know that the expulsion of the blood is from the artery that is incised, then sprinkle powder on the area and bind it with powders and bandages, and do not repeat this; leave the stone and do not extract it, for the patient will likely die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	And then treat the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	When the intensity of the bleeding has subsided after several days and the area has become clean, then you may return to your operation until the stone is dislodged.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter LXII.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	Of section on hernia repair.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	A hernia is nothing but an aggregation of moisture in the white membrane below the tendon of the groin containing the intestines, and it is called a sac.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And sometimes it is in the proper fatty layer which nature has prepared for the intestines, so that it seems to be another intestine; and it is the tendon of the groin between the white membrane we have mentioned, and this is not the case.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to weakness that occurs in the groin muscles, because this material accumulates there, and sometimes it happens due to impact on the groin.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this moisture may have various colors, for its color can be leaning towards yellowish or blood-red, or reddish, or black and foul, or watery and white, and the latter is better.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	Here are the signs by which it is known where this accumulation of water is such as this: for if it is in the white skin that we have mentioned, then at that time the abscess is round, inclining slightly in length like a hen's egg, and the skin appears red, because the moisture extends from it on all sides.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the proper fatty tissue, then the abscess is round but divided like an egg, and for this reason it is estimated to be another kind of egg.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the flesh of the skin and the white skin, then feel below with your finger.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And when you want to know the color of the moisture, then observe the color of the moisture in the abscess through a probe with which its form is preceded; and according to what appears in the marks of the probe, judge about what is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	When we come to the treatment of it with iron, then it is necessary that we command the patient to be bled if this is possible for you, and then apply the body of the instrument to it.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	And let the patient lie supine on his back on something raised slightly, and place below him clean cloths.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	And then sit you on the left side of him, and command the assistant to stand on his right, who will extend his hand from one of the two sides to the flesh of the skin and to the part near the navel.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	And then take a broad probe and cut the flesh of the skin at the proper place along its length near the abscess.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And the incision should be made according to the rule equally distant from the line where the hair on the genitals begins, until it reaches the white membrane.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	And scrape that area, and observe, and be careful so that you do not incise it; and your scraping of the place where you are scraping should gradually continue until it is suspended on the flesh more delicately, carefully examining the scraping according to the quantity possible for you.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	And then pierce the membrane full of water at a wide perforation, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And then separate between the two lips of the incision with forceps, and extend the membrane in the parts above; and do not touch the part containing the genitals, and incise the membrane in that manner as is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	And incise that area either entirely or in pieces, and especially the thin part carefully, for if you do not examine the incision meticulously, there is no assurance that the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if the flesh protrudes from its place at the time of your operation, after you have completed the incision of the membrane, return it inside, and then adjust the two lips of the genital part with stitches, and then treat it as you would other wounds until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the flesh corrupted by some other illness, then you should tie off the vessels that are above the suspensory ligament, remove the flesh, and then treat it as we have described.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the water is aggregated in two separate parts, then you will know that there are two hernias; therefore, incise that part as you did with the other equally; and if it appears to you to be an operation, then you should perform it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And then you should wipe away the blood, and insert into the sections wool submerged in oil or in rose oil; and place afterwards another piece of wool which you have soaked in wine and oil, and spread that over both thighs and the region of the abdomen; and cover with doubled cloths and poultices, and bind those with a bandage according to this method:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	And then two cloths should be pressed and filled with carded wool according to this pattern; and the ends should be made such that they are pressed against the buttocks or with wet wool, and should be attached to the structure in the belt of the breeches, and one end should reach into the cleft between the buttocks, and the second should reach to the part above the genitals, and two ends on each side over both thighs, and all attachments should be adjusted in the belt of the breeches.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And in some cases this hernia is treated artificially with cautery at the section of the groin; and it is that you take a thin knife-like cautery and insert it along the line between the genitals, and ignite it as we have recommended until the white fatty tissue containing the fluid becomes visible, and then you take a cautery in this shape:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is shaped like the Greek letter.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And then pierce that fatty tissue, and ignite it until all the moisture is expelled.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And then extend the fatty tissue with hooks, and strip it off with hooks, and cauterize it with a thin ignited cautery; and cut away that part as much as possible until you have removed all of it; and be careful that your hands are not burned by the fire.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is safer and longer lasting in stopping blood flow, and better than an operation with cutting.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	If there is opposition to you in the form of an abscess at the time of cutting or cauterization, or blood flow, then choose the method that suits your situation from what has been described, and opt for the treatment that seems most appropriate to you based on what has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is small and does not dare to undergo a second operation due to its horror, then administer a puncture as I recommend; and you should be certain, from what we have said about the signs, that the hernia is fluid-filled.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Now you should have the patient sit on some raised cushion, and then puncture the abscess at its lowest part below the navel, making the puncture as long as the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the incision be wide enough to allow all the fluid to drain out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And then apply pressure to the area and bandage it so that the remaining fluid can drain out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then treat it until the wound is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is opposition to the flow of fluid when you puncture it: this happens only because the white membrane in the wound opening resists and prevents the outflow of fluid. Then you should place a small cup or instrument used to extract water from cysts into the wound, as described; or apply pressure around the wound with something small.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And know that the water returns, and it is waited for about five months or so then; and when it has been absorbed, then it should be punctured according to that method, because in this way the patient will have passed his days.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter LXIII.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	On the section about flesh hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in the section about this hernia, there is great fear of death in severe cases; therefore, in my view, it is best to avoid it and be saved by that better option.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am now recalling the operation on that one and the specifics of the abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that abscesses arise in those parts where the genitals are composed, and this happens for various reasons: either due to acute and harsh excess, which is discharged into the genitals, or due to impact.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess is according to the color of the skin, and it is not relieved by pain, and it is a severe abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And when the abscess is calcified, its color is dark, and it does not respond to treatment.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And in some cases, it is caused by the entanglement of arteries, and by the inflammation of those that are already perceived upon reflection, or by the inflammation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	But what is caused by the inflammation of arteries is known by the dispersal of the abscess when you press it with your fingers; and it does not need to be touched.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	He who is treated by inflating a vein is not dispersed for any cause owing to the compression thereof.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible to perform a section on this particular area as well as on other flesh; and that you should incise the tendon of the groin muscles, and immediately there will be the membrane above, and extract the white fat, and free the suspensory ligaments of the vessels, and tie them, and cut the suspensory ligaments after you have freed it from all parts.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Then if the membrane has already united with those flesh parts, now you should extract the membrane and incise it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is an adhesion between any part of the fat, or between what is between the vessels, now you should free all that adhesion and incise it with a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if it is a natural growth of flesh in the place of the adhesion which is behind, now you should incise all that there is and extract the membrane as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then when your operation is complete, now fill the wound with wool infused in olive oil and wine; and immediately treat it with the other methods until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter LXIV.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	On the treatment of hernias that involve viscera.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	A vit is an abscess wrapped in some kind of membrane similar to that around the softening of the testicles, and it makes exercise and walking difficult due to the condition.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	In the treatment of this disease, one must be cautious because it is preceded by a certain memory or recollection.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, it is necessary to call it an operation as they did in the beginning.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And he says that you should make the patient sit on a raised stool; then pull up the scrotum with your fingers; and then tie the cords of the genitalia to the parts below; and have another assistant do this while you extend them forcefully.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	Then incise with a sharp and broad knife across the veins so that the veins are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	Then carefully remove it completely as we have described in the extraction of arteries, which is done on the surface.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	Then place a needle with double fine thread in it, and tie one end at the first location where you act, and tie the other end at the last of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	Then incise those in the middle location with a straight cut according to the length of the body, and extract what is aggregated from the fetid and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	Then treat the wound as you would treat other wounds where you want healing to take place, so that the veins that cause one of the testicles to darken do not become an issue, for it is not harmful if done properly.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if you act on all the veins, then it is necessary to remove the testicles or to bind them with the veins, so that they are deprived of all nourishment due to the cutting of the veins, and become atrophied, or to bind them in such a way that it does not harm them.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter Sixty-Five.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the Treatment of Intestinal Hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to a section that occurs when the caphac is extended over the front part of the sides of the abdominal cavity, because through this rupture some of the bowels enter.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the caphac or near it, and these two types occur for various reasons: either by impact, by jumping, by shouting, by lifting some heavy object, or by similar actions.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this, when it is due to an extension of the caphac, is that it occurs gradually over a long period of time, and not suddenly, and it appears as an abscess equal in size to what the caphac compresses within the bowel.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of it is when it is due to a section of the caphac, because at the beginning it causes intense pain suddenly; and it appears as an abscess different from what is normally seen near the navel, and this is because of the protrusion of the bowel, and the body of it beyond the caphac.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And in some cases, the membrane is detached along with the bowel, and this type of intestinal hernia is called zirbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And in some cases, it is caused by gas, and in other cases the bowel forms a fissure where it is trapped, and this causes great pain to the patient, and often causes severe pain, especially when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of these types of this illness with iron, there is fear, because it is necessary to avoid any risk in such cases.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	Here is the translation:
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	From the side cut the fold by which the covering of the testicles is attached above, and incise the covering of the testicles entirely along its length; then insert hooks into both sides of the section as you deem necessary to hold it open.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if you make the section according to the quantity that it is possible for you to remove of that part.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then peel away the fatty tissue which lies beneath the covering of the testicles until the hard white membrane of each part is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Now insert your finger in the place where the testicle is attached, between the white membrane that lies beneath the covering of the testicle, and between the subsequent membranes, and loosen any adhesions that are present behind the testicle.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then use your left hand to pull the covering of the testicles away from the parts, and with this extend the white membrane upwards with your hand, and lift the testicle with the membrane towards the section; and instruct an assistant to raise the testicle upwards while you dissolve any adhesions behind it with a solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And feel with your fingers to ensure that there is no cause for concern with the bowel wrapped in the hard white membrane.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause for concern, then place it back into the abdomen below.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle with seven fine threads, and insert it through the back of the membrane which lies beneath the covering of the testicles that you have sectioned; then cut the ends of the threads so that four remain, and tie them in some figure resembling a cross; and ligature those parts of the membrane we have mentioned below the covering of the testicles with a strong thread.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	Here are the contents wrapped in bandages the extremities of the veins and tie them firmly with a ligature so that some of the veins which nourish those cannot transmit any cause by which an abscess may not occur from this.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And tie another ligature above the first ligature, a space of three fingers away; and between these two ligatures leave hanging from the skin the part which is below the scrotal cord in quantity with the size of a finger, and incise all around it according to roundness, and remove it from there.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then incise in the part below the scrotal cord where the section will bleed and discharge as we have recommended in what we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then apply wool soaked in oil to the wound and place it on the plague; and apply the ligature as we have recommended (and sometimes the skin is cauterized, which we mentioned near the incision to prevent bleeding, for some times this happens) and leave the ligature so that it does not fall.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the dressing of it is delayed, hot water should be applied and placed on that so that it does not fall as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat the wound with the usual treatment for wounds until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter LXVI.
De hernia ventosa.	On Ventral Hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this type of hernia, it has not been seen that anyone has dared to treat it with surgery.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	The first surgeons said that it is done as we have recounted in the hernia that is on the abdomen; which is that you tie the vessels near the section where you have made it easy for yourself; and near there dry up in the middle place with regard to the abscess, so that the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And treat the plague as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter .lxvii.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the division that is made in the glands.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	In some cases, there is rupture in the glands as we have said, and examine the area.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And they do not assign any cause for the pouch to the genitalia; and if they do, it is rare; and it returns to this in all cases.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged with this, a narrow opening in the duct through which the pouch descends into the duct; and it happens that due to the extension of the duct, which is in the glands as we have said, because the duct is stretched, and then becomes softened, the area becomes abscessed and must be examined.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for it is with cautery as was preceded in the narration.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And in some cases, it is treated with iron according to this method: the patient lies on their back between two chairs, and then the area of the rupture of the abscesses is dried by examining and sectioning horizontally according to the length mentioned.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then stretch the white duct that is below the groin until it is exposed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	Take the knife and place it above the prominent part of the navel, and press it onto the belly button.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then apply the two prominent points at the end of the line of the navel, and join them to each other with a suture.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the end of the knife, and do not incise the navel completely, nor extend the wound, nor for any other reason as I will teach you in the treatment of an intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then treat it as you would treat other wounds, and when you incise the area, clean it and restore the wound until it is healed; for the navel is contracted and the prominence of rupture has not been adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this location, for it is closer to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter LXVIII.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the cord of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.
